short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy your clean and neat New Tab that will stimulate your productivity daily. Customize your desktop the way you like it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
★ Enjoy your New tab extension, which is meant to boost your productivity and help you focus on your activities on a regular basis. Personalize your clean and tidy working environment.

The Apollo Tab extension will provide you a plethora of customizable choices, such as:
   - new wallpaper every time you open a new tab to keep your desktop neat and to stimulate your productivity.
   - full-screen mode as a cool screensaver
   - weather, location, and time widget
   - there is a small addition - you can customize the look of your desktop. Choose whether you want a time widget or not, hide the weather option or turn off location.
  -You can also choose between the wallpapers, or shuffle them. 
  - You will have a custom search box and every time you make a search you will be enhanced to a new customized search page

★ We assist you in creating your unique browsing experience.
Adjust everything to your liking, and you'll be more productive and focused while working. Or simply enjoy the fresh appearance of your office.

★ If you want to uninstall the Apollo tab extension, all you have to do is right-click the extension icon in the toolbar and select the option ‘Remove from Chrome’. 

You won’t have Apollo Tab anymore, sorry about that :(...

You might have a question, feedback or if you want to contact us for any reason, please feel free to do so. 

You can use the links below to find out more about us and find your contact form.
